description.effect: May use “invocation” spell as a “ritual” spell. Targets become all nearby companions and duration becomes 12 hours. No effect on spells with “instant” duration and only effects spells with “single” targets.
description.value: A subspecies of Barrierwood, also known as the Guardsman of the Woods. It thrives in the alpine heights and its hardness is said to be comparable to orichalcum.
